snippet: The festival will host the latest installment the series — in which popular movie scripts are performed by contemporary actors — with a reading of Alan Ball’s screenplay for the 1999 film “American Beauty.”
abstract: Toronto International Film Festival will host the latest installment of director Jason Reitman’s Live Read series, in which popular movie scripts are performed by contemporary actors, with an unrehearsed reading of Alan Ball’s screenplay for the 1999 film American Beauty.
lead_paragraph: The festival will host the latest installment the series — in which popular movie scripts are performed by contemporary actors — with a reading of Alan Ball’s screenplay for the 1999 film “American Beauty.”
